message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. This way we both walk away with something.
Alice, your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking.
Bob, time is money, and yours is losing value fast!  I'll offer you $35. It's better than waiting any longer, don't you think?
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My money is losing value every round!  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
